thread.title: Jeremy McConnell cradles smiling son Caben as fans praise him for finally embracing fatherhood
thread.title_full: Jeremy McConnell cradles smiling son Caben as fans praise him for finally embracing fatherhood

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Jeremy McConnell cradles smiling son Caben as fans praise him for finally embracing fatherhood
text:
Jeremy McConnell cradles smiling son Caben as fans praise him for finally embracing fatherhood The Irish model is gazing adoringly at the newborn Share Father and son: Jeremy and baby Caben Share Get celebs     
Jeremy McConnell has shared another picture with his newborn son Caben-Albi. 
The Irish model, 27, who has seemingly finally embraced fatherhood, took to social media on Sunday evening. 
In the picture the former Celebrity Big Brother star is gazing adoringly at the tot, who looks adorable in a light blue baby grow and is smiling back at his dad. 
Jeremy captioned the sweet picture with a heart emoji and a triumphant fist pump. 
The picture - the second he's posted with Caben after acknowledging he's the father following a paternity test - was soon inundated with comments from his followers who were happy to see he has stepped up after initial doubts. Jezza shared this picture on Sunday evening (Photo: jeremymcconnellcooke/Instagram) 
"Glad you've seen sense and being a good dad. No negative comments to be made! 
"Just nice to see you being a good dad now and you both getting on may it continue," one wrote. 
"Stay consistent in his life, don't f**k up down the line like so many - he's the future right there!" another shared. 
"Well done Jeremy getting your s**t together and stepping up," wrote a third. Father and son (Photo: jeremymcconnellcooke/Instagram) Read More Stephanie Davis announces the sex of her friend's baby - but confuses fans who thinks SHE is pregnant 
While another commented: "Just wish they'd enjoyed her pregnancy together." 
Jeremy's post comes after he was spotted picking out presents for his son â€“ and for ex Stephanie Davis - in Liverpool last week. 
Wearing a bright orange hoodie, a black cap and jeans, Jeremy perused the shelves at the Disney store, a children's shoe shop and jewellery shop Swarovski. Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell (Photo: Supplied by WENN) 
In the pictures, taken a day before the funeral of Jeremy's father, the ex- Celebrity Big Brother star carried a number of bags after a successful shopping spree, while his friend Ray Quinlan toted an enormous cuddly bear for the six-week-old boy. 
Having spent some time in Liverpool, both Jeremy and Steph flew to Dublin to lay Jez's father to rest. 
Eugene Cooke had been suffering from cancer and died just two months after becoming a granddad. Read More
